residential building permits for california 1982-1989 year total single family multifamily rank by state 1989 237,279 162,140 75,139 1 1988 255,559 162,167 93,392 1 1987 253,171 136,128 117,043 1 1986 314,1569 145,569 168,000 1 1985 272,317 114,202 158,115 1 1984 224,845 112,839 112,006 1 1983 172,569 102,509 70,060 3 1982 85,656 51,160 34,496 4 source bureau of the census construction industry research board
